name: clang-format-2025
description: Use Clang-Format in Visual Studio Code

clang-format.style.description: clang-format style.(-style=value, value can be file, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit or json configure)

clang-format.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style.(-fallback-style=value, value can be none, LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit)

clang-format.language.cpp.enable.description: enable formatting for C++ (requires reloading Extensions)

clang-format.language.cpp.style.description: clang-format style for C++, leave empty to use global clang-format.style

clang-format.language.cpp.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for C++, leave empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.c.enable.description: enable formatting for C (requires reloading Extensions)

clang-format.language.c.style.description: clang-format style for C, leave empty to use global clang-format.style

clang-format.language.c.fallbackStyle.description: clang-format fallback style for C, leave empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.csharp.enable.description: enable formatting for C# (requires reloading Extensions)

clang-format.language.csharp.style.description: clang-format style for C#, leave empty to use global clang-format.style

clang-format.language.csharp.fallbackSty.description: clang-format fallback style for C#, leave empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.objective-c.enable.description: enable formatting for Objective-C (requires reloading Extensions)

clang-format.language.objective-c.style.description: clang-format style for Objective-C, leave empty to use global clang-format.style

clang-format.language.objective-c.fallba.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C, leave empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.language.objective-cpp.enab.description: enable formatting for Objective-C++ (requires reloading Extensions)

clang-format.language.objective-cpp.styl.description: clang-format style for Objective-C++, leave empty to use global clang-format.style

clang-format.language.objective-cpp.fall.description: clang-format fallback style for Objective-C++, leave empty to use clang-format.fallbackStyle

clang-format.assumeFilename.description: When reading from stdin, clang-format assumes this filename to look for a style config file (with -style=file) and to determine the language.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run eslint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run eslint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run eslint
scripts.prepare: npm run generate-config && npm run package
